ped_phonecall: Give me a sec, let me text my Old Man
driver_droproof: Let me drop the roof down.
driver_entercar: Jump In! Let me show you around the City of Los Santos.
driver_changeradio: Change the radio station to what ever you like.
passanger_optout: Feel free to jump out at any of the destinations we stop at, otherwise I can drop you at the Job Centre when were done.
passanger_exit: Catch you later!.. Hope you enjoyed the tour.
tour_complete: Hope you enjoyed the tour. dont forget to grab a ID Card. Catch you later!.
